data.headline: The Fed needs two industries to suffer in order to beat inflation, Jim Cramer says
data.summary: It’s going to be tough for the Federal Reserve to beat inflation without getting the auto and housing industries in check, CNBC’s Jim Cramer said on Tuesday.
